name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, expertly skilled in **TypeScript**, **React**, **Azure**, **AWS**, **CI/CD**, and **Terraform**. Proven success in building high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors, focusing on asynchronous services and stream processing. My comprehensive tech stack includes **.NET**, **Kubernetes**, along with modern frameworks like **Node.js** and **FastAPI**. 

I have a strong foundation in developing enterprise-grade platforms with an emphasis on microservices architecture, AI/ML capabilities, and real-time data processing. My hands-on experience in deploying robust solutions is complemented by my work in edge software deployment and integration with digital identity and open banking systems. 

I excel at collaborating with cross-functional teams, producing clear user stories and design documents, and ensuring projects align with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am also adept at implementing MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**, driven by a commitment to quality, security, and regulatory adherence.
